Public sector cuts: More than $8 million spent on one government ministry’s redundancy plans https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/public-sector-cuts-more-than-8-million-spent-on-one-government-ministrys-redundancy-plans/UUHME6MJZBG2DGUYPCC2Z6PKY4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/public-sector-cuts-more-than-8-million-spent-on-one-government-ministrys-redundancy-plans/UUHME6MJZBG2DGUYPCC2Z6PKY4/ Azaria HowellThousands of roles have been cut, or are on the line, across the public sector.
